snippet.title: “TOKYO CHRONOS” THE 2ND. TRAILER / Eir Aoi ”UNLIMITED”
snippet.description:
Coming Early 2019!! VR Mystery Visual Novel ”TOKYO CHRONOS”

The second official trailer is released!
Eir Aoi’s new song, “UNLIMITED” will be the opening song of TOKYO CHRONOS!

Website　      https://tokyochronos.com/
Twitter           https://twitter.com/TokyoChronos
Instagram      https://www.instagram.com/tokyo.chronos/

"TOKYO CHRONOS" Email Newsletter Sign Up Form. → https://tokyochronos.com/form/animenyc2018/

Platform: PSVR, Oculus(Go, Rift), Steam


-Production Staff
Director：Haruki Kashiwakura (Motion Director of "Expelled from Paradise")
Scriptwriter：Kou Segawa (Writer of the mystery novel, "Konya, Kimi ni Korosareta to shitemo")
Producer：Kazuma Miki (Editor/Producer of "Sword Art Online")
Character Design：LAM (Illustrator)
Publisher：Sekai Project (Steam publisher for "CLANNAD" & "NEKOPARA")
Promotional Consultant：Tokyo Otaku Mode Inc.

The opening song：Eir Aoi "UNLIMITED"

-Cast
Kyosuke Sakurai: cv.Yuto Uemura
Karen Nikaido: cv.Yui Ishikawa
Yu Momono: cv.Ibuki Kido
Yuria Togoku: cv.Shoko Yuzuki
Sai Kamiya: cv.Romi PARK
Ai Morozumi: cv.Azu Sakura
Sota Machikoji: cv.Keisuke Ueda
Tetsu Kageyama: cv.Yuki Kaji
